bills.title: Resolution to urge U.S. Congress to take action relating to mortgage trigger leads
Exempt a portion of interest earnings from individual income tax
Require homeowners' associations to distribute annual budget and financial reports
Generally revise laws related to trigger leads
Generally revise laws related to county and city central committees
Revise laws related to manufactured homes
Allow property owners to vote in voted levy elections
Provide property tax rebates for principal residences
Authorize transfers and other necessary measures to implement HB2 Section A
Revise selective sales taxes to provide ongoing property tax relief
